RelatedSentence: Former President Bill Clinton will receive the Dean 's Award for Public Leadership next month from the Humphrey School of Public Affairs at the University of Minnesota .

At the event , held at 5:30 p.m. June 9 at Northrop Auditorium on the Minneapolis campus , Clinton will offer reflections on civil rights as part of the Humphrey School 's series of events marking the 50th anniversary of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 .

The Public Leadership awards are designed to honor people who have contributed to the public good through leadership and service , the school said .
